mapper.select: select count(hm.message_id) as allCount, sum( hm.send_flag ) as successCount , date_format( hm.creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as creationDate from hmsg_message hm join hmsg_message_transaction hmt on hm.message_id = hmt.message_id WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'EMAIL' and hmt.last_update_date >= #{startDate} and hmt.last_update_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY date_format( hm.creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d' )

SELECT hm.message_id AS id, hts.message_name, hm.last_update_date, hmt.trx_status_code AS statusCode, hmt.transaction_message AS failedReason, hmt.transaction_id AS transactionId, hm.creation_date AS creationDate FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id straight_join hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.template_code = hm.template_code JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'Email'
and hmt.trx_status_code = #{status}
and hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{subject}),'%')
AND ( hmt.trx_status_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
ORDER BY hm.last_update_date DESC

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT hm.message_id AS id FROM hmsg_message hm
STRAIGHT_JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.template_code = hm.template_code straight_join hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id
WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'Email'
and hmt.trx_status_code = #{status}
and hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{subject}),'%')
AND ( hmt.trx_status_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
) tmp_count

SELECT hmt.transaction_id AS id, hmr.receiver_address AS email, hts.message_code AS messageCode, hts.message_name AS messageName, hmt.trx_status_code AS statusCode, hmt.transaction_message AS failedReason, hm.creation_date FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id JOIN hmsg_message_receiver hmr ON hmr.message_id = hm.message_id LEFT JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.server_code = 'CHOERODON-EMAIL' AND htsl.template_code = hm.template_code LEFT JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id WHERE hm.server_code = 'CHOERODON-EMAIL'
and hmt.trx_status_code = #{status}
and hmr.receiver_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{receiveEmail}),'%')
and (hts.message_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%') or hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%'))
and hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{failedReason}),'%')
AND ( hmt.trx_status_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmr.receiver_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hts.message_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
ORDER BY hm.message_id desc

SELECT hm.message_id, hm.message_type_code, hm.server_code, hm.creation_date, hws.webhook_address as webhookAddress, hmt.trx_status_code AS statusCode, hmt.transaction_message AS failedReason, hm. SUBJECT AS messageName FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id JOIN hmsg_webhook_server hws ON hws.server_code = hm.server_code WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'WEB_HOOK'
and hmt.trx_status_code = #{status}
and hws.webhook_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{webhookAddress}),'%')
and hm. SUBJECT LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%')
and hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{failedReason}),'%')
AND ( hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hws.webhook_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hm. SUBJECT LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
ORDER BY hm.creation_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE hm, hmt FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id WHERE hm.`creation_date` <= DATE_ADD(curdate( ), INTERVAL - #{cleanNum} DAY) AND hm.message_type_code = #{messageType}
mapper.select: SELECT hmt.transaction_id FROM hmsg_message_transaction hmt JOIN hmsg_message hm ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id AND hm.message_type_code = 'email' WHERE hmt.trx_status_code = 'F' AND hmt.creation_date >= #{startDate} AND hmt.creation_date <= #{endDate}
